mutants.code:
def minimal_photo_area(n, coordinates):
    coordinates.sort()
    top = [coordinates[0], coordinates[-1]]
    right = [coordinates[n - 1], coordinates[n]]
    case2 = abs((top[0] - right[0]) * (top[1] - right[1]))
    case1_width = top[-1] + top[0]
    min_height = float('inf')
    for i in range(1, n):
        min_height = min(min_height, abs(coordinates[i] - coordinates[i + n - 1]))
    case1 = case1_width * min_height
    return min(abs(case1), case2)

    return min(abs(case1), case2)
